meanings.definition: A city in New York, United States.
meanings.sent1: People in Horseheads enjoy the local parks.
meanings.sent2: I visited Horseheads last summer for a family reunion.
meanings.sent3: Why did the Horseheads library have a book sale?
meanings.sent4: The small town of Horseheads felt like a cozy nest.
meanings.sent5: The name Horseheads always makes me think of a friendly community.

meanings.definition: A type of rock formation resembling the head of a horse.
meanings.sent1: The hikers were amazed by the horseheads they found on the trail.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed a fascinating collection of horseheads.
meanings.sent3: The artist sculpted a horseheads statue out of clay.
meanings.sent4: The clouds in the sky looked like giant horseheads floating by.
meanings.sent5: The mountain range had peaks that resembled majestic horseheads.
